psychographics.lifestyle: A solitary, research-focused lifestyle centered around academic work, with occasional travel for personal enjoyment. He values efficiency and practicality in his purchases and prioritizes thorough research before committing to a purchase.

shopping_behavior.research_habits: Conducts thorough research through Google searches, YouTube videos, and articles, focusing on technical specifications and comparisons. He relies on self-conducted research rather than trusting product reviews.

profile.narrative: This user is a solitary academic researcher living in Boston who prioritizes efficiency and value in his purchases. He conducts extensive research, primarily using online resources, to inform his decisions, focusing on technical specifications and performance. His shopping behavior is driven by a need to support his research activities and a preference for direct purchases from manufacturers.
